name: de.finalfactory.tagger
description: Final Tagger is a flexible multi-tagging solution for your Unity projects. Effortlessly apply multiple tags to GameObjects and swiftly find them using intuitive search and filtering. Formerly known as Tagger, Final Tag enhances project organization and streamlines workflow for efficient game development.

samples.description: Demonstrates how to filter Units in a Strategy game using Final Tagger.
Demonstrates how to filter and search items by tag in an inventory using Final Tagger.
Demonstrates how to use the TaggerFilter class. Inspector only demonstration.
This script shows how to create advanced filters using Final Tagger. Script Only.
This test scene demonstrates the performance of Final Tagger.
